text: ileohge hayeo hananim-eun geubun ui myeonglyeong-eulo geudaeege gyesihananigeudaeneun ijeon-e seongseoga mueos-imyeo mid-eum-i mueos-inji alji moshaessnola geuleona hananim-eun kkulan-eul gwangmyeong-eulohago geugeos-eulo geubun-ui tteus-i issneun jongdeul-eul indohadolog hayeossnola sillogeudaeneun ingan-eul olh-eun gillo indoha lila
